full_text:
Page 2516

I just wanted to keep you in the loop as to the visit arranged for tomorrow with the USAO.

Thanks,

Supervisory Staff Attorney
CLC New York
Metropolitan Correctional Center
150 Park Row
New York, New York 10007
p: (646)83(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
f: (646)836-7665

>>> (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (USANYS)" (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov> 8/13/2019 2:05 PM >>>

The list of visitors from our office is below:

(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)

As discussed, we would like to see the 2nd floor psycyh observation and suicide watch area; the 9th floor SHU, and Epstein's cell, which we understand to still be cordoned off. As discussed, we would appreciate if only MCC legal would escort us, and we will not speak to any of the guards present given the ongoing investigations. Please give me a call with any questions, and let us know what time and where we should go, and if it would be easier for us to enter via the 3rd floor bridge.

Thanks,

Assistant United States Attorney
Southern District of New York
Tel: (212) 637(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)

Page 15119
DOJ-OGR-00026185

additional_notes: The document appears to be an email chain discussing a visit to the Metropolitan Correctional Center. The email contains redactions, likely for privacy or security reasons.
